data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Huancavelica to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Huancavelica, Peru
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Huancavelica, Peru, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Huancavelica, Peru not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, help the 65,523 believers in Huancavelica to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Pisabo people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Huancavelica. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 389,277 lost in Huancavelica that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.section_summary:
the state of Huancavelica, Peru has a population of 454,800.

We estimate Huancavelica has 65,523 people who might know Jesus, 362,265 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 27,012 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Huancavelica, Peru.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
